title: ISic020045. ISic020045
body:
Facsimile Images

1double_axe

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Double-headed axe (bipennis) sign recurrent as a mark throughout the ancient world. Agostiniani (1977, p.16). In the Elymian ceramics the sign is once painted as a decoration (see Ambrosini 1970, p.464).

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 45 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201

  • Tusa 1967 no.78 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001538
  • Ambrosini 1970 464 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002187
